meanings.definition: A rug placed in front of a fireplace.
meanings.sent1: The hearthrug kept my feet warm as I sat by the fire.
meanings.sent2: She knelt on the hearthrug toasting marshmallows over the flames.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the hearthrug was a giant scratching post!
meanings.sent4: The hearthrug was a cozy island in the sea of the cold wooden floor.
meanings.sent5: The hearthrug, with its intricate patterns, added a touch of elegance to the room.

meanings.definition: A small rug used to cover a hearth.
meanings.sent1: Mom asked me to vacuum the hearthrug to keep it clean.
meanings.sent2: The hearthrug protected the hearth from scratches and stains.
meanings.sent3: The hearthrug was so small, it looked like a mini magic carpet.
meanings.sent4: She lifted the hearthrug to reveal a hidden compartment underneath.
meanings.sent5: The hearthrug, with its frayed edges, added a rustic charm to the room.
